body:
### What we are..
Computer Training and CAD Engineering Services
    Shree-Cad Service started as a Training Institute for Technocrats in the CAD arena. After overwhelming response from Local clients and Technical personnel, company was started as a CAD/GIS/PIPING Design and Man Power Consultancy company.      We successfully executed several Projects in the fields of CAD,GIS,HVAC,WATER SUPPLY, FIRE FIGHTING and PIPING Design including local and outside projects within stipulated time to the Clients satisfaction. All of our clients are quite happy with our services and glad to continue with us in the near future. We are well equipped to match the needs of Global Clients / Employers and job seekers.

name: Shreecad
